attributes.action: Repeal the Criminal Defence Service Act 2006
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new system of means testing, introduced on 2 October 2006 is fundamentally flawed and results in (1) The denial of justice for some of the most vulnerable and needy people in society, and (2) substantial delay and financial cost to other areas of the criminal justice system.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister "to Repeal the Criminal Defence Service Act 2006".

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page10683.asp
